Question: Metaphotonics Openlab CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Metaphotonics Openlab

CES 2024

- One-step printable platform for high-efficiency metasurfaces down to the deep-ultraviolet region
- Introduces Zirconium dioxide (ZrO2) nanoparticle-embedded-resin (nano-PER) for UV metasurfaces
- ZrO2 nano-PER has high refractive index and low extinction coefficient in UV region
- Enables repeat and rapid manufacturing of UV metasurfaces
- Designed high-efficiency UV meta-atoms for near-UV and deep-UV
- Fabricated UV metasurfaces in a single step by nanoimprint lithography
- Demonstrated high-quality UV metaholograms operating in near-UV and deep-UV
- Achieved high conversion efficiency of 72.3% at Î»=325nm and 48.6% at Î»=248nm
- Proposed method brings UV metasurfaces closer to real-life applications
Summary_cn:
亚光子学开放实验室

CES 2024

- 一步打印的高效率亚表面平台，适用于深紫外区域
- 引入氧化锆(ZrO2)纳米颗粒嵌入树脂（nano-PER）用于紫外亚表面
- ZrO2纳米PER在紫外区域具有高折射率和低消光系数
- 实现了紫外亚表面的重复和快速制造
- 设计了用于近紫外和深紫外的高效率紫外亚原子
- 通过纳米压印光刻一步制作紫外亚表面
- 展示了在近紫外和深紫外操作的高质量紫外元全息图
- 在λ=325nm时，实现了72.3%的高转换效率，在λ=248nm时，实现了48.6%的高转换效率
- 提出的方法将紫外亚表面带入了接近实际应用的阶段
